file_content.text: We've been underestimating the Gormak. They're more dangerous than we thought.
I found out what happened to the Voss. They were killed by beasts the Gormak modified with cybernetic technology.
Cyber-beasts. Huh. I'd heard the Gormak had a way with technology, but I never imagined anything like that.
Guess this planet's full of surprises. I better file a report to my superiors. Thanks for looking into this.
Let me know what you find when you investigate the wreckage of that walker.
Sergeant Usser. Pleased to meet you.
It's good to see a Jedi here. I'd heard rumors your order had reservations about the Voss. Understandable, I guess.
Always nice to chat with a fellow soldier. I've been stationed on worse worlds, but this place can wear you down.
Always good to speak with someone who believes in the Republic cause. Dealing with the Voss all day is exhausting.
Not that the Voss are bad people. Just a little... different. But they seem to like the Republic well enough.
I don't think they have a preference between us and the Empire.
The Voss are neutral.
Officially, that's true. But the Voss aren't so bad. A few of them even offered to help me out.
Interesting opinion.
The Voss sound cold and aloof, but that doesn't mean they actually are. A few of them even offered to help me out.
Getting the Voss to join us could be a key to defeating the Empire.
We have to win them over.
Truth is, I think they're already halfway there. A few of them even offered to help me out.
There's an old Republic walker out in the wilds. Left over from when we first came to visit.
The Voss volunteered to investigate the wreckage for us. Only they never came back. Starting to think they walked into a trap.
We need the Voss to trust us. We can't be sending them off on missions where they never return!
This is a diplomatic disaster!
I didn't ask--they volunteered! Probably didn't want a bunch of outsiders tromping all over the place.
Look, the Voss did us a favor by investigating that walker. The least we can do is find out what happened to them.
I guess you're right.
It's going to cost you.
Tell you what: Find out what happened to those Voss, and I'll find some credits to cover your "expenses."
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
Nice. We'll never win the Voss over with that kind of attitude.
So do something about it.
I can't leave my post. Officially, I'm not even supposed to get involved. But I can't just ignore this.
What can I do to help?
I was hoping you'd say something like that.
The Voss helped us out. Now we can return the favor.
Here's the location of the wreck. Good luck.
The Voss claim to be neutral, but I think deep down they're actually on our side.
